DOC.brief_title: DHA Supplements Improve Insulin Sensitivity Obese Pregnant Women ( The Omega-3 Pregnancy Study )
DOC.detailed_description: The effect overweight obesity pregnancy maternal child health serious long last . Overweight obese woman likely develop gestational diabetes pre-eclampsia ( high blood pressure proteinuria ) pregnancy type 2 diabetes cardiovascular disease pregnancy . Also , child born woman increase risk obesity , diabetes , high blood pressure later life . The increase risk disease condition may occur overweight obese pregnant woman decrease insulin sensitivity increase inflammation . The nutrient DHA omega-3 fatty acid important brain function , development central nervous system , visual function infant . DHA may also benefit pregnant woman baby improve insulin sensitivity decrease inflammation , thereby decrease risk gestational diabetes pre-eclampsia pregnancy . The purpose study evaluate effect DHA supplementation insulin sensitivity , inflammation , fetal growth overweight obese pregnant woman . This study enroll woman 24 28 week pregnancy . They follow delivery . Participants randomly assign receive either DHA supplement placebo daily basis end pregnancy . At baseline study visit , blood sample collect ; height , weight , skinfold thickness measure ; questionnaire assess diet medical history give . Participants complete three diet recall day visit , answer question diet previous 24 hour . At second study visit occur 30 32 week pregnancy , blood sample collect . At third study visit occur 34 36 week pregnancy , blood sample collect repeat body measurement occur . Three diet recall complete , participant take part meal challenge , blood collect different time eat study-provided breakfast . Researchers review participant ' medical record birth occur .
